summary:
This mod adds Atari, a Husky (without armor). 
With 3 dialogue options: \"Wait here.\", \"Follow me\". and \"Go home Atari.\"
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/374/atari3.jpg[/IMG]
[size=0.4][color=#00FF00][b]~UPDATE! latest version: v1.31[/b][/color][/size]
[size=0.4][color=red][b]~Dawnguard DLC required![/b][/color][/size]
[size=0.4][color=Gold][b]~If you have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037][u]UFO[/u][/url] installed, make sure to put \"UFO\" and the \"UFO dawnguard patch\" after \"Atari\" in the load order![/b][/color][/size]

UFO as long as you load UFO and the UFO dawnguard patch after you load atari

This mod adds a follower by the name Atari, a Husky. With 3 dialogue options: \"Wait here.\", \"Follow me.\" and \"It\'s time for you to head home.\" 
He is essential, so you won\'t lose him fighting by your side:) Also, you can use him without being a Dawnguard, and you can use him while being a Vampire!
(You can get an armored husky by following the Dawnguard questline).

[IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/5871/tesv2012082920311221.jpg[/IMG]

You can find him in the inn: Dead Man\'s Drink, which is located in the center of Falkreath.

[IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/4894/tesv2012082920281184.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/2893/tesv2012082920284891.jpg[/IMG]

Some more pics:

[IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/6766/tesv2012082920305675.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/6638/tesv2012082920310740.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8844/tesv2012082920233228.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/8711/tesv2012082920233633.jpg[/IMG]

Hope you enjoy your new friend!

[color=#FFFF00][b]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]
I\'d like to give a big thanks to [b]DarkPhoenixxy[/b], who helped me out fixing the bugs.
Check his work here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3348939]DarkPhoenixxy[/url].

Also a thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1073917]Aenkill[/url], for making these beautiful screenshots!
[color=#FFFF00][b]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b][/color]

[b]Other mods that are shown in the pictures:[/b]

~ [b]Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44[/b] - Found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]here[/url].
~ [b]Newermind Bow Collection by newermind43[/b] - Found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19240]here[/url].
~ [b]Glowing Eyes by Dumle35[/b] - Found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21232]here[/url].
author: Avloecx
